coreAttributes.name: BFG 9000
coreAttributes.description:
Representing the pinnacle of UAC research and design, the BFG 9000 is the most advanced firearm ever designed. Fully self contained and deployed as a handheld platform, it is capable of an excessive amount of firepower.
When big is just not quite big enough.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(draw)] [npc.her] BFG 9000, ready to use it in combat.

hitDescriptions.hitText: Aiming and firing [npc.her] BFG 9000, [npc.name] [npc.verb(manage)] to hit [npc2.name] with a powerful plasma ball!
Taking aim at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] BFG 9000, [npc.name] [npc.verb(pull)] the trigger, unleashing a powerful blast of plasma energy that slams into [npc2.namePos] torso!
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(aim)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] BFG 9000, and, pulling the trigger, [npc.she] [npc.verb(manage)] to hit [npc2.herHim] right in the chest!

missDescriptions.missText: Taking aim at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] BFG 9000, [npc.name] [npc.verb(pull)] the trigger, letting out a frustrated cry as [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(aim)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] BFG 9000 and [npc.verb(pull)] the trigger, but [npc.she] [npc.verb(end)] up missing [npc.her] target!
